Reviews.Title: sony  KDL-40XBR2 40  SWEET
Reviews.Author: W. Fuiten "T-BONE"
Reviews.Content: i did alot research on hdtv before i bought my xbr 2.you see i had a stoke last july and was off for 7 months so i had alot of time.i talked to sony tecs so many times checing to make sure nothing new was coming out in near future.they asurred me it was not. you see i already had sony hdtv,and sony surround for less than 4yrs.and 2yrs.on surround sound.but after 3 months researching and price-watching.i just had to have 40xbr2.so i gave my 28yearold son all sony gear.my daughters were a little upset.well enough of this. i love my xbr with builtin hd tunner,a must for us off-air antenna people.i live in small town in ILLINOIS and get channels as far south as st.louis,mo.and as far north as champaign,il.with my 29.99 wineguard 4400 hdtv antenna i have hookedup from sony uhf/vhf on back of tv, not my directvHDreceiver,it dose not come near as good as sony HD TINNER hook up.oh did i tell ya I have 2 - 29.99 wineguard antennas upstairs on a spitter,1 pointed north and the other south using RG6 cable, not outside but facing a window inside my 2-story house.it works, why,I dont know. and dont buy an exspensieve dvd player unless you can afford it,[BUY A SONY HD BLUE RAY] get you a up-convert sony dvd player and hook up SONY HDMI cable from vidio 8 hdmi input on back of tv to your hdmi out on your up-convert dvd player,if you have everything hooked up like your sony support tec's tell ya,that blue light comes on and you wont beleive how good your dubbed dvds you make come in. make ya want to tell some one.the only thing i dont like about 40xbr2 is how and where they have[angle is bad] the 3 HDMI inputs back and side tv.i told sony tecs i could live with it. I LOVE MY XBR I bought from amazon.com  01/15/07  T-BONE  VIRDEN,IL.

Reviews.Title: in love with tv -- after awful shipping experience
Reviews.Author: Winston Chou "winchou"
Reviews.Content: I had never ordered a large appliance from Amazon before, but I've had such great experiences with Amazon in all other respects, I thought I'd try it (and save some sales tax!). I had to order the TV three times, cancel two orders, make several calls to Eagle (the shipping co), and it finally arrived thre weeks late. Argh.In the mean time, the price dropped $200. Bonus for my trouble.Anyway, now that I have the TV, I am back in couch-potato heaven. This thing is amazing. Watching HD cooking shows is a whole other experience. The picture quality is really state of the art for LCD. Conecting my computer and watching internet or home-produced video via the SVGA cable is a real treat, casue you can really share the video rather than crowding around a laptop. Even my slide shows look really good.The set-up with the remote is a bit time-consuming because there is so much going on -- lots of inputs, and lots of new ATSC channels to deal with. The remote is not exactly intuitive, and I wish there was a way to click thru favorites with another "channel" rocker, rather than having to go into the menus; same with external devices. Odd that it does not pick up the time automatically like my other TVs. The remote does, however, correctly manage my DVD-changer and my old S-VHS deck. When viewing the SVGA source, the menus display options for computer viewing, but it then becomes impossible to switch to other devices (you have to hit the channel button, then the menu button to get out of that mode --??).I love the flexibility to zoom any picture in a wide variety ways; I find myself using the "Wide" button a lot. The built-in faux-surround is amazingly good, and creates and excellent acoustic image with the screen -- very good for broadcast TV, tho you'll want the home audio system "on" for movies.The set is amazingly light-weight and easy to handle, but it does get quite warm after an hour or two of viewing. I wish the set had one more S-video input (it only has one) for my legacy boxes. It is very well finished, and is quite the show piece in the living room.

Reviews.Title: Sony wins again
Reviews.Author: Big Guy
Reviews.Content: I have always liked Sony television. My last set was an over 11 year old, 27 inch Sony. It still works great, but I wanted the latest cutting edge technology. This set fills the need completely. It has the greatest HD picture that I have ever seen. My eyes feel completely rested even after 3 hrs of steady watching. The sound is incredible. I have not even connected my external speaker system yet.The price from Amazon was $150.00 lower than a local sale price. No sales tax saved even more. The free shipping was great. Eagle delivered the set three days after ordering and even carried it into the den for me.

Reviews.Title: A Great T.V.
Reviews.Author: K. Hiseley "Aspiring Chef"
Reviews.Content: After doing research on Amazon and visiting the video stores to compare picture quality I decided on the 40" XBR2.  I was not sorry.  This T.V. has a great picture and was fairly easy to set up.  It has lots of options in the set up menu and the menu is fairly easy to use.  Although I have read of problems of "clouds" in the dark areas I have not seen anything like that in this T.V.  The HD picture is GREAT and even standard digital and analog signals look good on this T.V.  If you do not have a surround sound system the sound from the speakers is a very good quality.  If you do have a surround sound system it is awkward to have to go into the menu to turn the speakers off on the T.V. so the sound will go through your audio system.  I found that it was easier to run the sound directly from the cable box to my audio system and then just turn the sound level down on the T.V.

Reviews.Title: Performs as expected
Reviews.Author: K. Henderson
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV now for only 2 days.  So far it has performed just as I expected after checking it out at various dealers and comparing it to the Samsung (which was quite a bit cheaper).  In fact the Samsung 46 inch was about the same price as the Sony 40 inch XBR.  However I liked the picture of the Sony and am pleased with the choice.  The delivery people that Amazon used (Eagle) were very helpful and waited until I set it up and got it working.  I love the picture both for DVD and satellite input.  I would recommend this TV.PS: I have read several reviews talking about the splotches when there is a black screen and I have been looking but this one seems fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Sony Product
Reviews.Author: chachster
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Sony KDL-40XBR2 through amazon.  It was a great experience.  Delivery was as expected, the set looks great.  I use my DirecTV HR20-700 through this via HDMI, the XBox 360 through VGA at 1080P, and my Nintendo Wii and DVD player also connected.  This is a great unit.  HD looks wonderful and SD looks good too.

Reviews.Title: Perfect picture
Reviews.Author: Justin Kim "Nihilator"
Reviews.Content: This is really the best TV you can buy in the 40" range.  After tons of research online and hours spent in many stores, I can tell you that the XBR2 has the best picture quality available.  I would say the XBR2 (40") has better picture quality than even similarly sized plasmas.  The blacks are wonderfully dark and the colors are vibrant and accurate.Be sure to get your settings right by going online and searching for user forums.  Use these as a starting point, then adjust to your liking.If you are considering buying this TV, do it.  You won't find a better 40" anywhere (and the price here is good too).

Reviews.Title: Beautifully Designed
Reviews.Author: Jodi Sweet
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about buying this TV (or any TV) because I don't watch it much.  After redecorating I wanted to make a change from the clunky old TV to something thin with clean lines.  This television is beautiful.  We were speechless when we put it in place in the room before we even turned it on.  When we finally did turn it on we were amazed all over again.  The colors are brilliant and everything we tried viewing looks wonderful.  Also, Amazon did an excellent job of getting it delivered to us and I couldn't be happier with it.  The local retailers all wanted $300-500 more and most charged delivery and setup fees.  I highly recommend buying this TV from Amazon.Update:  I've had this TV for a little less than a year now.  It's still amazing.  I don't have any issues with the blacks or clouding.  The picture is gorgeous.  After you watch your first high-def movie on this TV you'll never want to go to a theatre again.  The sound is excellent too.  I still recommend buying this TV.  The price is pretty reasonable for this type of TV since newer models have been released.  If you can find it, buy it.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cloudy Issue
Reviews.Author: Cooks4Kix
Reviews.Content: I too have experienced the cloudy issue on two sets.  On my first set, after watching it for two weeks did not make the clouds "go away" as another reviewer suggests.Agree with other post about AVS forum being helpful.  This issue needs to be addressed by Sony before selling more defective units.

Reviews.Title: Got better after i used it for a while
Reviews.Author: Macneto
Reviews.Content: Upon turning this TV for the first time i hated to admit it but i did experience the "clouding" issue that other people had posted. So i decided to take the TV on a 2 week test run. and i am so glad i decided to do so.first let me say that it is now 2 weeks later and the "clouds"(caused by some backlighting issues) have all but vanished, and i was left with a very clear picture no matter what i was watching. even dark films that had space scenes.Video games look truly awesome on this TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing HIDEF
Reviews.Author: John W. Fisher
Reviews.Content: Just received by Sony 40"XBR2 last week. Excellent no hassle delivery and set up. I upgaded my cable service to Verizon FIOS (fiber optic)in anticipation of delivery. WOW, I cannot believe the brightness,crispness and clarity of the picture.The HIDEF signal and image is nothing short of amazing,even more so when watching a live sporting event like football, baseball,golf,etc.almost 3 dimensional.There is no blurring, ghosting,clouding,etc. just perfection. Even the standard def channels look good if you watch them in the correct format.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Powerful tuner
Reviews.Author: Arthur Molho
Reviews.Content: In addition to all the features and inputs described for this hdtv, what I am most pleased with is that I am in an outlying area, 40 miles from most of the transmitters in my region, but do have a good degree of elevation (2000ft).  With only a very old minimal antenna, I am able to pull in HDTV broadcast signals on 4+ networks, some are amazing..such as PBS's signal.  With an upgraded antenna, I'd get more, especially if I added a preamp to that. Colors are vivid and from a good signal, the detail knocks your eyes out.Sure beats paying Comcast over $60 a month, or even Dish satellite over $50 a month for mostly junk that is crammed into the packages you are forced to pay for to get a few good stations without even local stations.  A local TV antenna installer was surprised and said that this HDTV must have a HOT tuner...I agree!  It is all I could ask for, and of course DVD's are amazing (without BluRay or HD DVD's yet).  The size is perfect for our home, but if I had a bit more room, I'd have gone for the 46" version--also rated highly by Consumer's.

Reviews.Title: Marvelous Picture
Reviews.Author: Ron Moeckel "TV addict"
Reviews.Content: This TV does a great job on all types of sources, upgrading them at least one level. ie., 480I to 480p, with great brilliance.  I have had a 55" projection Mitsubishi TV for over 5 years; and, while it is great, this set excedes it in some respects, such as viewing angle, brilliance, and upgrading.  With older eyes, such as mine, a 26" HD set was a waste,  This 40" is perfect for the modest-sized den or livingroom where space is minimal.  Sound is great.  The menus are a bit cumbersome, but, it seems, no manufacturer finds the best ways to easily access closed captions and other features.  the FREEZE feature is okay , but would be better if size were adjustable (it is 1/4 size).  A second tuner, w/ PIP would be nice.  A newer XBR3 is available, but I don't know if it is worth the extra cost.  While this was almost an "impulse buy" the Amazon price is still holding up after several months.

Reviews.Title: Clouds
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: ***ATTENTION***The "clouds" are an issue that sony is aware of. It happens in the corners of the display because screws that fasten the display and/or frame are being torqued too much in the manufacturing process.Yeah it still sucks, but it's not a permanent thing. Then again, at this price tag, it's still unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: 1080 Sony Bravia  TV
Reviews.Author: R. Levy
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  I have not experienced any problems since hooking it up.The blacks may not be totally black but it doesn't interfere with the picture.  The sound is amazing.  I do not see any ghosts that other owners have mentioned. The set is beautiful to look at and adds to my room's decor.I am extremely pleased with my Sony 40" HD bravia set.

Reviews.Title: For a Few More Bucks, Go First Class!
Reviews.Author: Jeannie
Reviews.Content: This has got to be the best HDTV LCD, or for that matter, the best "flat panel" TV thus far made! The picture is so "vivid" and "crisp" HD broadcasts appear to be in 3D! I've researched and looked at them all.Sony has gone the extra mile again with the XBR2 (the XBR3 has the same inner guts, but has a gloss black surround). The first thing my friends said when they saw them (yes I bought two, why deprive yourself?) was, "Wow, 3D!"There are lots of settings, more inputs than you will ever need, and they are all individually calibrated so you can switch from one to another and maintain your "customized" settings for each input; i.e. one for Cable, another for DVD, for VCR, Playstation, etc. However, the best thing about this Sony is the PICTURE! Do yourself and your loved ones a favor, spend a few extra bucks and get this SONY! They will thank you! Jeannie

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LCD!  Must see for yourself!
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: You need to go to Best Buy, Circuit  City, Tweeter and the Big Screen Store and get the remote from the salesman and adjust settings as recommended in AVS forums and check it out.  It is easy to realize that the XBR2/3 series has, by far, the best picture of all LCDs.  It may sound a little extreme to go to all these places, but hey, every place has it setup differently and when your spending almost $3000 on a TV you want to be certain on your choice.I read several reviews about the clouding issue but the only time I saw any noticable clouding was when there was no input, i.e. no picture being sent to the unit.  You have to talk yourself into it at other times.  I have now seen 6 units with no clouding problems and none with an issue.  I did notice the same people posted the clouding issue complaint on several sites leading me to believe it was a couple of select people who had a problem.If you buy this unit search for settings on AVS forum from petmic10.  It gives you a great picture across all signals and is a great place to start.  The factory settings are not the best.

Reviews.Title: Product/delivery/install
Reviews.Author: TV Guru
Reviews.Content: Great product as advertised.  I had seen it setup at a local audio/video store and loved the 1080p comparison with the Panasonic 780p plasma.  Much brighter and clearer.Delivery was as said.  1 week.Install was perfect.  The delivery folks brought the TV right to where I wanted it.  Unpacked everything.  And checked out right there.Amazon's white glove service was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Pretty performance wrapped up in a prettier package.
Reviews.Author: J. Weden
Reviews.Content: So far, I am thoroughly pleased with my Sony Bravia BR2 TV. I have not experienced some of the blurring in shadow areas that have been reported and the high def quality is unparalleled. The unit easily integrated into my existing 7.1 surround system and has become the perfect finishing touch. I recommend this unit and recommend Amazon for providing the best price out there.

Reviews.Title: the mercedez of LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Clouding issue:  After extensive research, bought 32V2500(manufactured nov06) from amazon on march 07 but had too much clouding effect so returned it with ease thanks to their excellent service, there were some reviews about the mural effects so instead of risking with amazon again, i went to bestbuy NYC(LIC) but the displayed ones (40 xbr2&3) had the clouding so i tried circuit city NYC 86st. Their display(manufactured jan07) did not so i asked if i could purchase the one on display but the regional manager said he never had returns with 40xbr2 in all 5 boroughs in last 12mo, so I decided to trust him and bought one(manufactured jan07) in stock not the display. It has been 5months since and there is NO clouding effect so far confirmed both by me and my wife who is very sight sensitive.Features:  If you crank up all the special features that you can't find in samsung & etc, which is well worth the investment home work, you'll know why this tv is the mercedez of all LCD HDTV. If you don't turn on all the features under custom you might not be able to see the difference with samsung except the audio.Signal strenth:  RCA rabbit ear had much stronger signal(80+) than power boosted radioshack signal amplifier (50+ with max) and if you are in direct path from the source (no obstruction between your antenna and the station), just about any antenna will do.HDMI cable:  There is no performance difference between $10 one from amazon vs monster so save it for a good ATSC(HD) dvd recorder which 40xbr2 can appreciate.  Goodluck and keep on researching!

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Television
Reviews.Author: J. Alderson
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these TVs for our two main bedrooms.  Overall, these TVs have been great.  The setup features make it easy to customize the display options exactly how you want.  The one complaint we have is that the Closed Captioning either is always on or always off, so if you have it off and mute the TV, you have to quickly hit a button to access and turn on the CC, and then turn CC off again when you are done.  But, its a minor inconvenience.  The TV can produce a very bright picture and is really amazing when displaying an HD picture.  And the headphone jack on the side of the TV is good for listening to things at night so as not to disturb others.  The plexiglass border, which includes the Power/Sleep Timer/etc. lights and the light up Sony logo is a unique feature which gives the TV an intersting/stylish effect (if you care about that).  We mounted our TVs with the Premier Swingout Arm for 37-50" TVs  which has done a good job of supporting the TVs.  Overall, we would recommend these TVs to anyone.  In our opinon, they are worth the extra expense over some of the other brands.

Reviews.Title: Most amazing TV I've ever seen
Reviews.Author: M. Dowling
Reviews.Content: Many people have been complaining about defects on Sony's recent line of XBR2 televisions - I can tell you that my order, placed on Mar 26 2007 and received yesterday, did NOT include a TV with defects.This is a beautiful set!  It gracefully upscales standard-def TV from my Comcast digital cable box, and displays the 1080i stream from HD cable BEAUTIFULLY.I love this TV.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia XBR is First Rate
Reviews.Author: Jkirk
Reviews.Content: The 2 Sony HDTVs we bought from Amazon are wonderful.  The picture, the sound, are much better than most!  And the price was very reasonable!

Reviews.Title: The KDL-40XBR2  is Awesome for Gaming!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Calandra "Gamer"
Reviews.Content: I purchased mine a few weeks ago. I have my Playstation 3 hooked up via the HDMI port, the picture is beautiful, I have no problems with it, nothing concerning the clouding rumor that's going around. My Xbox 360 is hooked up via the VGA cable into the PC input, I can get 1080P with that cable, the games are also unreal. I've played Serenity on HD-DVD, it was amazing at 1080P. This TV has 3 HDMI Ports, which is rare. I have my PS3, DVD player and Cable Box hooked up to them. If you're looking for the best LCD on the market, this is the one you must get, beautiful design on the outside, floating glass is cool looking.

Reviews.Title: This TV is incredible
Reviews.Author: B. Adams
Reviews.Content: After a long search and many reviews I purchased this TV. I could not be happier. This is one great television. I shopped around online and in the stores and this one is it. I knew it was the one when I took a friend to best buy with me who had the attitude that they are pretty much all the same with the exception of price. that is until they were taken aback by the picture quality. Go look for yourself. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: quit working 5 months after warranty...
Reviews.Author: Christian Hetrick "Christian"
Reviews.Content: First... I know you want to know the problem before reading my complaint.Bad Controller CPU Board.  Which is going to cost me $800-1,000 to fix at the closest service center if I choose to get it fixed.  I paid $2,800 for this t.v. and 1 year and 5 months later I'm expected to pay an additional $800 minimum to fix it.  B.S.!!!!I am extremely dissappointed with this Sony product and their customer service. After I had done tons of research and read hundreds of reviews on how good this t.v. was I finally felt comfortable spending this much money on a t.v.  I was in love with this product at first. It was everything the reviews had said except it had slight clouding.  Well, 1 year and 5 months after purchase the dang thing messed up.I come home from work to watch some t.v....turn it on...and there was no picture.  After a few seconds I heard sound from the speakers, so I automatically thought it was the satellite.  A few seconds later the screen turned BRIGHT GREEN!!!! I unplugged the satellite reciever and tested it on the dvd player...same thing bright green screen.  Unplugged everything and was just going to use the t.v.'s menu, but the same thing.  I actually couldn't pull up the menu, so I knew something bad was probably wrong.I called Sony customer service and went through a couple of trouble shooting tips, but they ended up ruling it unrepairable over the phone and said I had to take it to a service center.  The service center tech called and said it was the CPU board and it would be $800-1,000 to fix.  I called another service center and they said the same thing.It was manufactured in Mexico, so if you are thinking about buying this model I suggest two things:1. Don't buy it if it says "Manufactured in Mexico" with a manufactured date between August '06 - December '062. Get the extended warranty.  Because lately I've seen reviews of the backlight going out or some minor problems that are happening shortly after the 1 year manufacturers warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: S. Krishnamurthy "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from Sears during a sale. The setup was pretty easy and HD channels are in stunning clarity... There are no clouds issue with this set now I believe. I dont see any...The sound quality is also amazing. For those who dont have a home theatre system, well the TV's audio is impressive with XT surround.Worth the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Sony Bracia 1080p
Reviews.Author: Josephine Farmer "C. Farmer"
Reviews.Content: This product was priced better then any other sales location in my area. When we received this product all I did was plug it in an I still haven't adjusted the picture, the best TV I ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture - great tv
Reviews.Author: G. Burdick
Reviews.Content: Sharp picture on a great tv.Had a few setup problems getting the cable box/dvr to push input to tv.  When all else fails, pull the power from all inputs for ten minutes and let them re-boot when the power is restored.I like all the input options (cable, dvr, game consoles, dvd).  I no longer have to use external switch boxes to control the input signal to the tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD HD TV
Reviews.Author: SOS "SOS"
Reviews.Content: I ordered my TV over the holidays. Delivery was perfect using Eagle and the set had no problems.  Picture on both HD and 480i is beautiful. Using with a Sony upconvert DVD player with it which again provides a beautiful picture. Monitor converts flawlessly between video modes. Wide button on remote very handy for dealing with programs running on HD channels which are not in widescreen formatAlso have this hooked up to my laptop running at 1920 x 1080 resolution. Again, picture looks awesom.  Don't regret order at all.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Happy Southerner "Happy Southerner"
Reviews.Content: I researched HDTVs for over six months before I found the courage to buy. HDTV terminology and technology is confusing enough. Then there is the debate on LCD versus Plasma making it all quite confusing -- with neither emerging as the clear winner. It came down to this for us, we have a bright room and from everything we read LCD is the clear choice for this scenario.I watched local prices diligently for three weeks, and all the national retailers listed the unit about $500 above the Amazon price. I worried about making such a major purchase online. Never again will I worry. Ordering could not have been simpler. The TV arrived 4 days after I made the purchase. The shipper deboxed the unit in my den and it was ready to hook-up when I came home from work. Setup was simple -- really simple. I had the TV working in under 30 minutes.I have been using the TV for about 3 weeks now, and I can honestly say I grow more pleased with it the more I use it. HDTV is amazing and Discovery HD really understands how to make HDTV breathtaking! While I love the HDTV shows on the TV, I am most amazed how the TV handles regular channels. There is still a lot of TV out there not in HD format. Regular and zoom modes on the 40XBR2 do not appear overly grainy or distorted. We have a fairly cheap DVD player, and the TV displays those beautifully. So much so, a HD DVD player is not really on our wish list.I don't think you can go wrong with this TV or ordering it online from Amazon. I am sold on both.

Reviews.Title: Wait for more HD channels
Reviews.Author: T the P
Reviews.Content: Greatly satisfied with quality of video in HD. Audio is fair. Home theater system a must. Unfortunately, there are currently not enough HD channels available from ANY provider to make the cost of this purchase advisable at this time. Wait!!!

Reviews.Title: No Clouds
Reviews.Author: Nikolas J. Thorson
Reviews.Content: Not to battle anyone here but i got my TV back in septmeber watch an array of HD shows and HD-DVD, Blue Ray also have it hooked up to my Media Converter for watching TV shows i record onto my drive array and even listen to music and when i am listening to my mp3's/wma's my media converter has a screensaver that fades too black, as well as my cable box will stop dispaying my picture if i leave it on for too long.Now something that people also havnt touched on much the sound is great doesnt distort as it gets louder and works great in a 600 square foot room, i normaly am sitting at my computer desk why'll watching tv and the angles dont fade and the tv looks great. The HDMI hookups are great have my cable box on composet my DVD players and media converters on HDMI... about time one easy in and out cable is a joy elemiantes any hassle..

Reviews.Title: If you want 1080i HD this is a winner!!
Reviews.Author: John Babcock
Reviews.Content: The Sony 40XBR2 is a outstanding product. It works well, sets up easily and has an superlative picture.  Amazon provided an outstanding price and exceeded their promises related to shipping, etc.  The whole experience was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Incredible for over a year now!
Reviews.Author: David Mintz
Reviews.Content: I held off on this review for over a year now.When I bought it I was blown away.  This was an expensive piece, Sony TV's allways are more costly than thier competition, but they are also worth it.I have a PlayStation 3 (which is also a BluRay player) hooked up using HDMI.I have a PC hooked up to this with a DVI cable (with wireless keyboard/remote).We sit on the couch, and watch movies, play games, and use the computer.  All crystal clear, and of course in surround sound.  This has so many functions I havent even used, only had it for one year, and it has been worth its value many times over.  I would buy this again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: Fine Equipment
Reviews.Author: B. Berson
Reviews.Content: When this model first came out,there were all the stories about 'ghosting' and 'headlights' and almost every set seemed to have one problem or another,according to the owners.Of course,when people did their research of these sets,just about all they read were the aforementioned problems and therefore,looked very hard to find something wrong with their TV.If you look hard enough,you'll almost always find something to nit-pick at.Slowly,the problems started to 'ease' and the sets have become the standard of the LCD market.I doubt you could find a better set for the money.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Kim Loan Anzaldua
Reviews.Content: i have just bought this nice Sony KDL-40XBR2 40" Bravia XBR 1080p LCD HDTV and i am telling you guys it was the best buy. i want to buy this item for a long time but couldnt decide if or should i!? but then when i saw the price i was like wow. i was after this tv for over a year but i thought it was to much money but these guys are so cheap.i couldn't saved more money with these guys. and so i purchased it. the picture is so clear and the screen is very big. i just love it the item was described just like it said and the shipping went so fast guys. it said 5-7 days but it arrived exactly on the 6th day and i couldnt wait. well if you guys really decide to buy one i would say this one it is really the best choice u could make and you really won't regret it believe me.

Reviews.Title: Sony KDL-40XBR2 40"
Reviews.Author: One of customers
Reviews.Content: We are a Deaf family, visually oriented and totally fussy with colors and overall video quality.  We must say, this is the best hdtv we have experienced.  We had one, 42" before this one and we had to send it back.The other reason why we bought this high ended one, the quality of closed captioning is great.  No flitting or funny fonts.

Reviews.Title: couldn't be more pleased
Reviews.Author: A. Corbo
Reviews.Content: I bought my Sony KDL 40 XBR2 approximately one month ago. The delivery was prompt, the communications were good, and I am very satisfied with the product. The TV worked fine right out of the box. I had done significant research on this TV. The reviews that I read were very helpful, that is why I'm writing this review. The picture is top notch, the colors are magnificent and you won't be dissappointed.

Reviews.Title: A great tv
Reviews.Author: T. E. Robins
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, and the menus are easy to navigate. If you hook this up to a ps3, or a blue-ray player you will be very happy. The only issue I have is with the remote control. The keypad is higher up then any remote I've used since the early 1980's. Other than that, this tv is worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Sony kdl Bravia hdtv
Reviews.Author: Mrs. K. "Carol"
Reviews.Content: I like dealing with Amazon--I've never had a problem--this product so far is great!!--got a great review while researching it--the only problem I had was with the company that delivered it--they called to set up a date to deliver and came the day before--luckily my husband happened to be home--CK

Reviews.Title: Bravo for Bravia XBR2
Reviews.Author: 1consumer "Tim"
Reviews.Content: I received my Sony KDL-40XBR2 on March 30th.  I was amazed at how quickly it set itself up to receive scores of available HD and non-HD channels with just my Radio Shack amplified indoor HDTV antenna - no cable, no dish.  The picture is truly stunning and so far no "clouds."  Manufacture date is March 2007.The set itself is the best-looking HDTV on the market today.  I coupled it with an Oppo DV-981HD DVD player that converts standard DVD's up to 1080p making for great looking movies; so great, that I can wait contentedly while the two new DVD formats fight it out.  I received prompt order fulfillment from Amazon and attentive communication and delivery from Eagle.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia KDL-40XBR2
Reviews.Author: Alexander Kaluga
Reviews.Content: I found this flat panel LCD TV to meet my expectations. Quality of picture is great, although you do need to have HDTV cable/satellite box to fully enjoy it. TV speakers featured SRS and BBE technologies will fill your room with deep surround sound.If you have any computer/laptop you can connect it to Sony Bravia TV using S-Sub 15 PC input, and use it as a big monitor. It also has another 8 video inputs including 3 HDMIs. For me that was second major reason (after picture quality) why I got this particular model.I give this product deserved 5 stars.It's a great piece of technology but in my honest opinion price is higher than it should be. As very good alternative I would also suggest to check out Sumsung HDTVs line, for example LN-S4095D.

Reviews.Title: This is a simple review.
Reviews.Author: R. FAIRCHILD
Reviews.Content: This is a great system.  Every input and output that you would want.  Especially good in high-lit rooms.  The viewing angle is great.  Just for those two things I would have upgraded from my analog CRT TV.  But this is a great investment as more TV stations go to HD and more programs are shot in HDTV.  Bottom-line impressive.  But if you haven't had or seen an HDTV don't think you are going to be blown away by extremely high detail.  This will only come when everything is full HD.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy Camper
Reviews.Author: James N. Mayfield
Reviews.Content: I just received my Sony XBR2 40" TV and couldn't be happier!!!!1.  I saved a bundle by getting it through Amazon.com and with none of the problems you often hear about from the online discounters.  Amazon is an example of a company with a superior business model.2.  The service to my door was first rate.  Delivered within the schedule set at the time of the order.  Once it hit town, I received a call to set up a precise delivery time, and it was delivered at the scheduled time.  The delivery person was friendly, helped unpack and inspect the unit for damage, and stayed while I plugged it in to see that it worked. (Everything worked perfect)3.  The picture quality is everything I expected.  (I will play around a little with settings, but it is great "out-of-the-box".)4.  I know others haver reported problems, but I am a picky customer and can report I didn't have any.Summary:  A GREAT PRODUCT--SOLD BY A RELIABLE COMPANY--DELIVERED IN PERFECT CONDITION--ON TIME.  Add to this no sales tax or delivery charges, what's not to like.

Reviews.Title: HDTV Review
Reviews.Author: H. Wichterich
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed my new Sony very much. The HD viewings are of excellent quality. The disturbing reflection I observed on my previous TV (15 yrs old) are no longer a problem.

Reviews.Title: No clouds!  Excellent TV.
Reviews.Author: L. Liroff
Reviews.Content: I read about the problem some claimed.  At the store this was the best looking TV.  Far superior then all the others.  Hoping I wouldn't encounter the cloud problems I took a risk and bought it.  I've had the set for a week now and it is stunning.  I can't imagine how it could be better unless it broadcast 3 dimensional programming.  The only complaint is that there aren't enough HD broadcasts.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular HDTV
Reviews.Author: M. Woods
Reviews.Content: I received my Sony KDL-40XBR2 Bravia a few weeks ago from Amazon in perfect condition.  The picture on this unit from the HD networks is spectacular, beyond my expectation.  Since I do video editing, I am highly critical of picture quality, and this set provides fantastic resolution.  I highly recommend this HDTV if you are looking to enjoy high quality television.  Even my homemade DVD's look fabulous.  Needless to say, I am very happy with this purchase and the service from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Sony KDL-40XBR2 40" Bravia XBR 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ross Castagnolo "Ross"
Reviews.Content: Could not be happier with this purchase. Unit was delivered sooner than expected. Picture is great, clear as can be, colors are phenomenal. I would recommend this Sony TV to everyone!!

Reviews.Title: I couldn't be happier!!!
Reviews.Author: B. Russell "Videophile"
Reviews.Content: It was one week from order to delivery. The gentlemen that delivered the TV unpacked it and placed it in my livingroom. Great transaction. I shopped for a while to get the best price, military exchange price was even higher. I have 5 different video systems hooked up and there is still 4 more inputs...LOVE this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: First Impressions
Reviews.Author: N. G. Athanas
Reviews.Content: I have just connected the LCD and I find it unbelievable in performance.Next step is a must, a surrpund sound system.

Reviews.Title: Superior
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Persen
Reviews.Content: All you can ask for in a HDTV and more. It was [...] less than the least expensive price at Circuit City. PLUS, no tax. The shipping service was incredible. It was flawless, and the delivery man waited until I turned on the TV prior to departing. We are VERY happy with every Amazon.com purchase.

Reviews.Title: Clearly a step up
Reviews.Author: Sean Bellinger "seanb"
Reviews.Content: We purchased the Sony Bravia after our 3 year old Gateway 42" HD plasma suddenly died.  While I was concerned about the premium price of the unit, its perfomance has more that lived up to our expections.  HD programs are more vivid and alive compared to the plasma TV.  The unit is very stylish and appears to be well constructed.  Time will tell but I'm looking forward to trying it with a Blue-ray DVD.

Reviews.Title: Sony KDL-40XBR2 40" Bravia XBR 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Paul Heslin
Reviews.Content: Excellent  LCD TV  WORTH THE higher COST  Wish warranty info on Amazonsite. nO INFO ON entended warranty available.

Reviews.Title: Honest opinion
Reviews.Author: Trushar Mistry
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product.The concept behind buying electonics is that, the more you wait the better you get. If you wish you enjoy the things that are out today then buy the best of best that you can afford and chuck the rest of the world.This TV in my opinion is the best for me, I have done extensive research and i think for my room this fits perfect.Amazon is offering at a low price and the best thing is that within 30 days if the price drops, they will refund the difference.

Reviews.Title: Clearly an excellant product
Reviews.Author: H Dean
Reviews.Content: The two main attributes being clear stable picture and excellent sound to be satisfied with a TV, this one delivers. Amazon and their delivery service got it out to me very quickly, even before I was really ready for it.

Reviews.Title: Not a good purchase!
Reviews.Author: S. Larson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this television December of '06.  Although the television is nearly 3 years old, the first 21 months it was used at most an hour a day.  Around August of '08 the television began having issues sporadically.  I would have to power the television on a few times before it would turn on (despite the fact that the power light was on).  There was no sound and no picture, just a blank screen.  Finally in September of '08 the television never fully turned on (still a power light on, but no picture, no sound.  After contacting a repair man, I was told the main board is probably 'fried' and needs to be replaced at the cost of $4,000.  I found mutliple instances of this when 'googling' the problem!  Not having purchased a 2 year extended warranty, the television is now useless.  I'd suggest googling no picture, no sound on the KDL40XBR2 before making this purchase

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV...does anyone have a color profile for it?
Reviews.Author: Arjun Banker "arjun banker"
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is gorgeous, but for some reason the colors look strange when I hook it up to my computer.  Does anyone know where to get a color profile for the monitor?

Reviews.Title: Disappointed due to product reliability
Reviews.Author: David D. Bie "dbie99"
Reviews.Content: When the TV works, it's good.  Mine broke three months out of warranty and the repair cost was very expensive.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding in every way!
Reviews.Author: Mike S.
Reviews.Content: Supurb picture quality framed by outstanding design, this HDTV does not disappoint. Was concerned prior to purchase about the "clouding" issue, but my set was manufactured after a date when Sony rectified the problem, so it was a non-issue.

Reviews.Title: good buy great tv
Reviews.Author: Lucille Fisher
Reviews.Content: everything was good from the Purchase, the price, the delivery, and of course the tv. no complaints totally satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Sony KDL-40XBR2 40" Bravia XBR 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: W. doCarmo "Winston"
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound.  While it was easy to set up, the instructional materials need to be made clearer.

Reviews.Title: The best TV out there!
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Grieco
Reviews.Content: This Sony is the best there is out there.  I have my cable through a hdmi cable and my PS3 is also hooked up to the TV this way.  The picture is unreal.  I am mad at myself for not buying it earlier.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia Television break after one year
Reviews.Author: K. Freeman "Keith"
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY A SONY BRAVIA TELEVISION. They work for one year and then break. They then try to upsell you on a new television when  you call to get a repair.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture!
Reviews.Author: Law Guru
Reviews.Content: We did alot of research before purchasing this TV and are very please with our decision!  This is a high quality picture TV that is easy to set up and operate!

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Squash 'N' Squeak "The Silencing Machine"
Reviews.Content: At the risk of sounding like a Sony employee trying to boost the already huge sails of this TV, let me just say that I can't believe the crystal clear picture that this TV has. Everything about it is just amazing. I had cable before, which was ok, but after my dad got this TV, I'm not sure I'll ever be able to watch a standard cable TV again. The TV channel also comes with over 900 channels, a lot of which you won't find on cable, including my new favorite channel MHD: the channel that MTV and VH1 wish they could be. The 900 channels are music channels, which is also a cool feature. And then there are channels that dedicate their time to when were in their prime, like Nick Gas which shows classic Nick shows (you know, the time when Nick was actually GOOD). So overall, I HIGHLY recommend you get this amazing TV; it's well worth the price.Yeah, I know I didn't talk about the technology used to make the TV and I didn't use any big confusing words to make myself look smarter than I am, but I'm 14 going on 15, so give me a break...

Reviews.Title: Amazing.
Reviews.Author: Gemmy Tsai
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time researching televisions, and decided on this one.  I was considering the Panasonic plasmas, which are an incredible value for the picture quality, but ultimately the Sony looked better, both on its picture quality and style.The picture quality is sharp, clear, and amazing.  The black levels are unbelievable - the blacks are the same as if the TV were off.  With a computer connected through a VGA cable, the picture was stunning - you could see every little pixel in high res.  Blew my mind.  The integrated speakers are pretty good too.Finally, this thing just looks good sitting in your living room.  From the little LED lights at the bottom to the floating glass border, it is absolutely fantastic and can complement any room.One negative is that SD doesn't look as good in comparison to the HD (understandably), but from what I understand the SD is better compared to SD on other Plasma's and LCDs.  Also, this unit is expensive.  If you're looking for value, look elsewhere.  If you're willing to spend a little extra for something that will last you a long time, then go for this unit.

Reviews.Title: Looking for advice
Reviews.Author: J. H. Davis "Duxter"
Reviews.Content: Need advice about Sony 40 inchers. My service is DirecTV and it's excellent. I own an XBR from the pre-HDTV years (not so  many years ago) that's terrific but a real beast to move, which I may do. My question is:  Which of the myriad  Sonys wouid look sharpest with NON-HDTV service? Original digital service is more than adequate and I refuse to pay extra for the dif--if there is one. I watch a lot of sports, news, some drama.  Costco has a new Bravia with 190 as the Sony item number and there is a "W" series in ads. Does anyone have any advice/experience?  I would be eternally greatful! (the stars were "required")

Reviews.Title: disappointment
Reviews.Author: B. Hayes
Reviews.Content: All I can say is IMAGE SMEAR.....I was really disappointed in the PQ of this panel.  There is alot of noise even on HD-DVD, and with Noise Reduction turned on (even on low), I saw the worst image smearing I have ever seen.  Images trailed across the screen with quick movement.  Totally unacceptable for a panel that costs as much as the Sony.  I think Sony is in trouble with the new Sharp LCD's as they are almost 1/3 with the same image quality.
